spec.expr:
_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| count() total_logs, count_uniq(fml.to) unique_to, count_uniq(fml.from) unique_from

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| fml.to:*
| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.to,fml.disposition) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc
| limit 10

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| NOT fml.classifier:in("Domain Safe","System Safe")

| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:in("Access Control-Discard","Access Control-Relay Denied","Attachment Filter","Banned Word","Behavior Analysis","Bounce Verification","Dictionary Filter","Domain Block","FortiGuard AntiSpam","FortiGuard AntiSpam-IP","FortiGuard WebFilter","Header Analysis","Heuristic","Image Spam","Newsletter","Newsletter Suspicious","SPF Failure","Sender Alignment","Sender Reputation","Session Domain","Session Limit","System Block","User Block")

| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:in("SPF Check","System Safe","Domain Safe","Not Spam","User Safe")

| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:in("Access Control-Discard","Access Control-Relay Denied","Attachment Filter","Banned Word","Behavior Analysis","Bounce Verification","Dictionary Filter","Domain Block","FortiGuard AntiSpam","FortiGuard AntiSpam-IP","FortiGuard WebFilter","Header Analysis","Heuristic","Image Spam","Newsletter","Newsletter Suspicious","SPF Failure","Sender Alignment","Sender Reputation","Session Domain","Session Limit","System Block","User Block")

| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

| fml.classifier:in("FortiSandbox File","Malware Outbreak","Virus Outbreak","Virus Signature")

| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}

| fml.classifier:in("FortiSandbox File","Malware Outbreak","Virus Outbreak","Virus Signature")

| stats by (fml.classifier) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.from:*
| fml.classifier:in("Access Control-Discard","Access Control-Relay Denied","Attachment Filter","Banned Word","Behavior Analysis","Bounce Verification","Dictionary Filter","Domain Block","FortiGuard AntiSpam","FortiGuard AntiSpam-IP","FortiGuard WebFilter","Header Analysis","Heuristic","Image Spam","Newsletter","Newsletter Suspicious","SPF Failure","Sender Alignment","Sender Reputation","Session Domain","Session Limit","System Block","User Block")


| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.from,fml.disposition) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc
| limit 10

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.direction) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| fml.to:*
| fml.classifier:in("FortiSandbox File","Malware Outbreak","Virus Outbreak","Virus Signature")

| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.to,fml.disposition) count() results 
| sort by (results) desc
| limit 10

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| fml.from:in(
  _stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
  | fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
  | fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
  | fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
  | $Logsql
  | fml.from:*
  | top 10 (fml.from)
  | keep fml.from
  )
| by (fml.from) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| fml.to:in(
  _stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
  | fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
  | fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
  | fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
  | $Logsql
  | fml.to:*
  | top 10 (fml.to)
  | keep fml.to
  )
| by (fml.to) count() results

_stream:{fml.type in (${type:doublequote})}
| fml.disposition:(${disposition:doublequote})
| fml.direction:(${direction:doublequote})
| fml.classifier:(${classifier:doublequote})
| $Logsql
| stats by (fml.disposition) count() results

spec.description:
Custom LogsQL filter attached to every query.
Set to "*" to not filter.
See https://docs.victoriametrics.com/victorialogs/logsql/
spec.name: Logsql
